DOC.brief_summary: To study relationship among lipoprotein metabolism , hypertension , hyperinsulinemia-insulin resistance African American male female . The study part Collaborative Project Minority Health investigate mechanisms insulin contribute cardiovascular disease .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The study part initiative `` Collaborative Projects ( R01s ) Minority Health '' . The concept initiative develop NHLBI staff 1993 Report Committee Appropriations , House Representatives , encourage NHLBI establish minority center facilitate diagnosis treatment cardiovascular disease . The initiative approve September 1992 National Heart , Lung , Blood Advisory Council release October 1992 . Julian Marsh one three investigator collaborative program Bonita Falkner Program Coordinator . DESIGN NARRATIVE : In sub-set subject either high low plasma insulin level glucose challenge ( insulin sensitive insulin resistant ) , investigator determine fractional absolute synthesis catabolic rate apolipoproteins B A-I , dominant lipoprotein Low Density Lipoprotein ( LDL ) High Density Lipoprotein ( HDL ) . They use stable isotope multicompartmental kinetic analysis follow oral bolus dose deuteroleucine . They hypothesize hypertensive African Americans hyperinsulinemia , small Very Low Density ( VLDL ) particles secrete converted LDL . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
